amendment.description: To make technical modification to the Marine Mammal Protection Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1782 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1782 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S11816-11819; text: CR S11819) To make technical modification to the Marine Mammal Protection Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1782 proposed by Senator Burns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1782 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
